name: Chicken Biryani
recipe: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt. Cook rice and layer with chicken. Simmer until done.

name: Samosa
recipe: Prepare dough. Cook filling with potatoes and peas. Shape and deep fry samosas.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
ingredients: Spices: Garam masala (1 tsp), red chili powder (1 tsp), turmeric (½ tsp)

name: Masala Dosa
recipe: Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds and curry leaves. Sauté onions, chilies, and turmeric powder. Add mashed potatoes and cook for 5 minutes. Prepare dosas on a skillet, add the potato filling, and fold. Serve with chutney and sambar.

name: Rajma
ingredients: Spices: Garam masala (1 tsp), chili powder (1 tsp), turmeric (½ tsp)
recipe: Soak kidney beans overnight and pressure cook until soft. Sauté onions, ginger-garlic paste, and spices in oil. Add tomato puree and cook until thickened. Mix in cooked kidney beans, simmer for 20 minutes, and serve with rice.

name: Aloo Paratha
recipe: Prepare dough with wheat flour and water. Mix mashed potatoes with spices and herbs. Roll out the dough, stuff with potato mixture, and cook on a hot skillet with butter until golden. Serve with yogurt or pickle.

name: Butter Chicken
ingredients: Spices: Garam masala (1 tsp), chili powder (1 tsp), turmeric (½ tsp)
recipe: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices. Cook chicken until done. Prepare gravy with butter, ginger-garlic paste, tomato puree, and cashew paste. Add chicken, cream, and simmer for 10 minutes. Serve hot with naan or rice.

name: Chole
ingredients: Spices: Chole masala (1 tsp), chili powder (1 tsp), turmeric (½ tsp)
recipe: Pressure cook chickpeas until soft. Sauté onions, ginger-garlic paste, and spices in oil. Add tomato puree and cook until thickened. Mix in chickpeas, simmer for 20 minutes, and serve with rice or bhature.

name: Pav Bhaji
recipe: Boil and mash vegetables. Sauté onions, tomatoes, and pav bhaji masala in butter. Add mashed vegetables and simmer. Toast pav buns with butter and serve with bhaji.

name: Dal Tadka
ingredients: Spices: Turmeric (½ tsp), red chili powder (½ tsp)
recipe: Pressure cook dal with turmeric and salt. Prepare tadka by heating ghee, sautéing cumin seeds, garlic, onions, tomatoes, and spices. Mix tadka into dal and simmer for 5 minutes. Serve with rice or roti.
